tasks.description: Create a GET /health endpoint that returns 200 OK with a JSON body containing server uptime and version. This is a simple single-file addition to the existing Express router.
acceptance_criteria: GET /health returns 200 with JSON body { status: 'ok', uptime: number, version: string }
Uptime is in seconds since server start

tasks.description: Write unit tests for the health check endpoint covering success response, correct content type, and uptime accuracy.
acceptance_criteria: Tests verify 200 status code and JSON content type
Tests verify response body has status, uptime, and version fields
All tests pass with bun test
